thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Republican Thune: Senate panel should see secret memo before release

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Republican Thune: Senate panel should see secret memo before release
text:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Republican Senator John Thune said the Senate Intelligence Committee should be able to review a secret House Republican memo before it is made public, possibly complicating White House plans to release the document soon, according to The Hill.
“I think the Senate Intelligence Committee needs to see it, for sure. Sen. Burr would like to see it and hasn’t been able to yet,” Thune was Quote: d as saying in the newspaper.
Thune, the No. 3 Republican in the Senate, also said he believed that a counterpoint memo written by Democrats on the House Intelligence Committee should be made public if the Republican version is released.
Reporting by Amanda Becker and Doina Chiacu; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
